document.full_text: a u.s. federal agency has sued over unequal treatment of more than 500 workers from india recruited to work at shipyards in mississippi and texas and over 200 thai farm laborers brought to hawaii and washington state, officials said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. sues over treatment of workers from asia
lines_and_colors: a u.s. federal agency has sued over unequal treatment of more than 500 workers from india recruited to work at shipyards in mississippi and texas and over 200 thai farm laborers brought to hawaii and washington state, officials said on wednesday.
